1.title: Episode #3.1
1.plot: Former college football players take one last shot at pursuing their dreams of playing in the NFL. As they prepare for the Regional Combines we learn about their histories, and what drives them to succeed.

2.title: Episode #3.2
2.plot: The players continue to train as some head to their respective Regional Combines to compete in front of NFL scouts and a chance to put down some impressive numbers.

3.title: Episode #3.3
3.plot: After the regional combines, the players wait to find out if they have made an impression on the evaluators. Jeremiah returns to his high school for support while LaQuan takes a trip back to the Boy's Ranch facility that changed his life. Mariel deals with both an unexpected injury and his grief over the recent loss of his younger brother. In Arizona, Mike feels confident in his Combine performance and blows off steam with some former teammates. Jakeem preps for his all-important Pro Day in Lubbock.

4.title: Episode #3.4
4.plot: A college Pro Day is the most important - and potentially, final - showcase the players will have to impress scouts and preserve their football lives. Jakeem, still stung by his exclusion from the Indy Combines, seizes his opportunity at Texas Tech's Pro Day, while Mike battles jitters before his workout at Arizona State. Meanwhile, punter Swayze prepares for big news about his wife's pregnancy.

1.title: Training for the Regional Combine
1.plot: NFL Network follows the story of six undrafted players as they seek to make an NFL roster.

2.title: The Regional Combine
2.plot: NFL hopefuls attend Regional Combines in the hope of catching the eye of an NFL scout.

3.title: Super Regional Invitations
3.plot: After competing in the Regional Combines, our NFL hopefuls wait in anticipation of an invitation to the Super Regional Combine in Detroit, that would put them one step closer to fulfilling their dreams.

4.title: Training for the Super Regional Combine
4.plot: NFL Networks follows the saga of four undrafted players as they train and prepare for one of the biggest interviews on their journey making an NFL roster, the Super Regional Combine.

5.title: On the field at the Super Regional Combine
5.plot: NFL Network follows the story of four undrafted players as they try to leave a positive impression on NFL scouts at the Chicago Super Regional Combine.

6.title: Competing for a Roster Spot
6.plot: NFL Network follows the story of four undrafted players as they try to make the final cut in preseason as they try to make an NFL roster.

1.title: Prepping for the Regional Combine
1.plot: Former college football players take one last shot at pursuing their dreams of playing in the NFL. As they prepare for the Regional Combines we learn about their histories, and what drives them to succeed.

2.title: The Regional Combines
2.plot: The players continue to train as some head to the Regional Combines to compete for a coveted invitation to the Super Regional Combine.

3.title: Regional Evaluations & Pro Days
3.plot: As the regional combines come to a close, the process of deliberations begins. A brutal numbers game in which NFL evaluators determine which of our players will advance to the Super Regional Combine. And for those athletes not attending the combines, the focus shifts to their Pro Days. Where they will face the intense scrutiny of the NFL team scouts.

4.title: The Road to the Super Regional Combine
4.plot: With the Super Regional Combine looming, some of our players put the finishing touches on their training as we dig deeper into their individual stories of struggle, loss and hope. Super bowl hero Malcolm Butler stops in on his former teammate and friend Chad Toocheck to provide a few choice words of inspiration.

5.title: The Super Regional Combine
5.plot: The players face one of the most intense tests on their journey to the NFL as they participate in the Super Regional Combine in front of front-office personnel.

6.title: Finding a New Home
6.plot: The 2015 NFL Draft is underway, some of our NFL Draft hopefuls are praying for a team to take a late-round flier on them, while others wait earnestly to be part of the first wave of undrafted free agent signings.

imdb.plot outline: Every year, thousands of college football players leave school with dreams of achieving a career in the National Football League. Of those thousands, 256 players are selected in the NFL Draft. The remaining - the undrafted - are forced to overcome another obstacle to pursue their dream. Undrafted goes inside the lives and tells the stories of various athletes as they try to fulfill their dreams of playing in the NFL. The series follows each as they prepare for the league's Super Regional Combines, an alternative showcase for lesser-known college players and older free agents. These Combine events have taken on greater importance in recent years as numerous undrafted players - including current starters on the Seattle Seahawks, Denver Broncos and Dallas Cowboys - have earned important roles on NFL rosters. Each Undrafted episode provides compelling personal and on-field footage of six longshots angling to create a life for themselves in the NFL.

The remaining - the undrafted - are forced to overcome another obstacle to pursue their dream. _Undrafted_ (qv) goes inside the lives and tells the stories of various athletes as they try to fulfill their dreams of playing in the NFL. The series follows each as they prepare for the league's Super Regional Combines, an alternative showcase for lesser-known college players and older free agents. These Combine events have taken on greater importance in recent years as numerous undrafted players - including current starters on the Seattle Seahawks, Denver Broncos and Dallas Cowboys - have earned important roles on NFL rosters. Each _Undrafted_ (qv) episode provides compelling personal and on-field footage of six longshots angling to create a life for themselves in the NFL.
